description: Generates a detailed evaluation rubric for a given project or activity, aligned with the learning outcomes and total marks. If total marks are not provided, defaults to 10.
prompt_template:
You are an AI-powered Course Design Assistant. Generate a professional, structured rubric for the following:

Activity/Project Title: {{activity_title}}

Description:
{{description}}

Learning Outcomes:
{{learning_outcomes}}

Total Marks: {{total_marks}} (If not provided, assume 10)

Instructions:
- Use a clear, structured table format.
- Include 3 to 5 evaluation criteria.
- For each criterion, define at least 3 performance levels (e.g., Excellent, Good, Needs Improvement).
- Allocate marks appropriately based on the total marks.
- Align criteria with the learning outcomes.
- Make the rubric relevant to industry skills.
- Use clean table formatting with headers, merged cells where appropriate, and consistent layout.

Output only the rubric in a formatted table. Avoid repetition.

example_input.description: Students must design and deploy a responsive landing page using HTML, CSS, and minimal JavaScript.
learning_outcomes: Demonstrate clean UI layout and usability
Deploy the page using a static hosting service

example_output:
| Criterion                         | Excellent (Full Marks)                                  | Good (Partial Marks)                             | Needs Improvement (Low Marks)                  | Marks |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------|-------|
| Responsiveness & Layout          | Layout adapts perfectly across all screen sizes          | Minor layout issues on some screen sizes         | Poor layout and responsiveness                | 4     |
| Aesthetic Design & Usability     | Clean, professional design with intuitive navigation     | Functional design but lacks polish               | Cluttered or confusing layout                 | 3     |
| Deployment & Hosting             | Successfully deployed with proper link and no downtime  | Deployed but with minor issues                   | Not deployed or broken link                  | 3     |
| **Total**                        |                                                          |                                                  |                                                | 10    |
